name: Slit-Throat Circus
description:
A game Demo made in 3-4 weeks by a team of Students for our final major project of this year.

The game follows the Protagonist Eva, who is distraught after the circus she called home and the family she used to preform with are torn apart due to the accident. faced with her family leaving she can't bring herself to say goodbye, even though it might be what they need.
